body_html:
@rafaelsimonmaia Thanks for the links! Unfortunately there is only a python 3 install in the Compute 6.1 folder. Do you maybe have build a .whl file for python 2.7 too? I have two cards with Compute Abilities: 3.5 (gtx 780) and 6.1 (gtx 1080 ti). So unfortunately i can't use your python 2.7 file (it's for Compute 5.2).

Do you maybe also have a working .whl file for TF 1.3 (and some instructions how to prepare other files and configurations) ?

I'm currently still on 1.1 (which works fine on most projects) with GPU support. Would love to upgrade (if it was as easy as before...).
